dataset.title: A new genus and two new species of Platyarthridae Verhoeff, 1949 (Crustacea: Isopoda: Oniscidea) from Brazil

abstract.para: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Bezerra-Pereira, Carlos Anderson Soares, Grangeiro, Daniela Correia, Lima, Lucas Ramos Costa (2023): A new genus and two new species of Platyarthridae Verhoeff, 1949 (Crustacea: Isopoda: Oniscidea) from Brazil. Zootaxa 5325 (3): 436-450, DOI: 10.11646/zootaxa.5325.3.8, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.5325.3.8

intellectualRights.para: To the extent possible under law, the publisher has waived all rights to these data and has dedicated them to the Public Domain (CC0 1.0). Users may copy, modify, distribute and use the work, including for commercial purposes, without restriction.

gbif.citation: Bezerra-Pereira C A S, Grangeiro D C, Lima L R C, plazi (2023). A new genus and two new species of Platyarthridae Verhoeff, 1949 (Crustacea: Isopoda: Oniscidea) from Brazil. Plazi.org taxonomic treatments database. Checklist dataset https://doi.org/10.15468/8866p7 accessed via GBIF.org on 2023-08-28.

bibliography.citation: Bezerra-Pereira, Carlos Anderson Soares, Grangeiro, Daniela Correia, Lima, Lucas Ramos Costa (2023): A new genus and two new species of Platyarthridae Verhoeff, 1949 (Crustacea: Isopoda: Oniscidea) from Brazil.
